mdRecord.dcterms:title: Notes as to Origin; 01 of 04
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 113-275, Scrapbook of Faulds Fingerprint Notes (includes publication and manuscript items.)Page 21-24; "Notes as to Origin of Finger P. Method of Identification"; Handwritten notes regarding articles to Nature magazine, and who originally thought of fingerprint use, written in first person. Possibly the unedited manuscript for Faulds's pamphlet of virtually the same title, includes timeline of life events. See item 009-126; 4 leaves; DF 871
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
